page.title: 03RECREATION (cont'd)
page.content: {Recreation(cont.)_}The large{sports {hall}of Downend Upper School is available for community use. There are facilities for playing{badminton, {squash,table tennis,indoor hockey, {5-a-side football, basketball, netball {and other indoor activities. {Bitterwell Lake}and the{River {Frome}are coarse{fishing}venues for anglers. Local opinion has it that the lake offers the better sport. The{River Frome}brings the country-side into the urban outskirts. The{Frome Valley Walkway}follows the river's course for several miles and provides an excellent opportunity to experience the tranquility and ecology of a river bank environment within easy walking distance of residential developments. It is one of the few amenities within the area that acts as an attraction for{tourists.
